properties.address: 1 Wellington Parade, Dukinfield, Lancashire SK16 4LE
properties.description: Opening mid-November 2024 on Thursdays - Will update the information once confirmed: The hub is a building open to anyone. Every Wednesday between 12-2pm we offer a tasty hot meal for £1 and a Free hot drink. Additional Hot Drinks only 20p. We are open as the Warm Hub Lunch Club between Mid November until March every week. This vital service is possible using the funding we have secured from The Jigsaw Homes Foundation this year. The Peoples Community Dukinfield Group volunteers work in partnership with Jigsaw Homes and other organisations and individuals to make vital services such as this a reality. #costoflivingcrisis #helpingothers #warmwelcomespaces #dukinfield
properties.title: Dukinfield Central Warm Hub Lunch Club

properties.address: Marple United Reformed Church, Stockport, Cheshire SK6 7NN
properties.description: We are a welcoming, warm safe and space for every age to come and have a cup of tea, coffee etc. sit and chat and be provided with a lunch. There is a wide variety of games including cards, dominoes, Cluedo, Othello, Draughts / Chess, snakes and ladders, ludo, hungry Hippos to name a few available. In addition, we have individual activities with arts and craft, wordsearch / crossword books, Chinese checkers, etc., and for our younger and young at heart visitors building bricks and toys are always available. We invite you to bring your own knitting / crotchet (and if you would like to learn how to knit or crochet some of our patrons are willing to teach). There is something for everyone and we pride our selves on being run by the community for the community. All of our lively staff are DBS checked, so what have you got to lose? Come down and see what we are all about.
properties.title: Funday Monday Community Group
